title: Jiahong Guo-College of Economic and Social Development
content: Dr Jiahong Guo is an Assistant Professor in the College of Economic and Social Development at Nankai University. He holds an Ph.D in human geography from Peking University. Dr. Guoâ€™s research interest is Economic geography, Industrial Geography, Industrial system. His research aims to enhance the understanding of the field of economic geography, especially industrial geography. His research have been published in several prestigious journals in the field of economic geography. Dr. Guo's work also gained international recognition from peers with citations over 200 times to date.
